entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Improve some reflection types - add not-null DeclaringType properties #86987
  • [JIT] Add embedded broadcast support to AVX512BW_BroadcastScalarToVector512 #86986
  • maybe create WASM module export from `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` #86985
  • create WASM module import from any `[DLLImport]` which doesn't match known static native symbols #86984
    8.0.0
  • conv.i4 with NaN returns 0 on macOS M1 #86980
  • Interpreter stack overflows when trying to execute a particular EH pattern with AOT #86978
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json xunit generic theories not working in Native AOT. #86973
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.ActivityContext.Current ability or similar #86966
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Pass Meter to HttpClientHandler and SocketsHttpHandler #86961
    8.0.0
  • Frequent WebSocket Compression Segfault #86960
  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests failing to find `dotnet.native*js` #86959
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector4 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #86957
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Vaes and Avx512Vaes #86952
  • [API Proposal]: Add public GetMIC/VerifyMIC methods to NegotiateAuthentication #86950
  • is there any way to that vs 2022 exists using vswhere although i dont install it #86947
  • Can't run blazor hosted wasm when BlazorWebAssembly project's has private tags for references #86942
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8.IsValid(...) #86937

Closed

  • ConfigurationBuilder is not parsing boolean params without an explicit declaration #86977
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror failure #80666
    8.0.0
  • DotNetBuildFromSource fail to compile src/libraries/shims/System.Data/ref/System.Data.csproj #86946
  • Could not load type 'SqlGuidCaster' from assembly System.Data.SqlClient on .NET 8 Preview #86969
  • JIT\Methodical\eh\finallyexec\nestedfinallycall_d failing with optimizations on #86561
    8.0.0
  • Events get ignored by COM in VBA (Excel) when invoked inside a Task #82628
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default. #20909
    8.0.0
  • Exception message for AmbiguousMatchException should include the name #18255
    Future
  • ILLink analyzer and code fixer passed twice to the csc #84119
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json's generator causes considerable package size increase #77897
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recognized internal namespace #86682
  • Planned System.Text.Json contract customization improvements for .NET 8 #71967
    8.0.0
  • JsonConverterAttribute not working with source-gen when converter is internal type #81703
    8.0.0
  • RSACertificateExtensions.GetRSAPublicKey Error #86845
  • [NativeAOT] Implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier() #84445
  • .NET 7 missing win32 System.IO.FileAttributes values #86955
  • Stack overflow exception thrown by `JsonSerializer.Deserialize` in a special case #85922
    8.0.0
  • CI failure in the "banana" rid leg on Centos Stream 8 #86169
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 7 for System.IO.Compression.Native.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #82518
    7.0.x
  • Json source generator should support JsonConverter on non-nullable and nullable types #66547
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4] Custom extended ToDictionary<TKey, TValue>() method conflicts with the one in System.Linq.Enumerable #86936
  • libhostfxr.so is not linked to libpthread and libdl.so #86940
  • [API Proposal]: Add build in UrlBase64 in runtime #86933
  • [API Proposal]: `ValueTextEquals` supporting `JsonEncodedText` as a parameter #86591
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Custom runtime without AppContext class throw #77054
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Loader tests failing on CI with Mono LLVM FullAOT #86327
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4] After setting SocketsHttpHandler.AllowAutoRedirect property as false, the HttpResponseMessage.StatusCode changed from "Redirect" to "Found" #86857
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23269.37] global tool "dotnet-snow" cannot load libSkiaSharp.dll #86571

PullRequests

Created

  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2191755 #86981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update runtime-codeql.yml to run 3x/week #86979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • adding vzeroupper before helper function call #86976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Native AOT testing in System.Text.Json. #86975
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm][build] Don't use GetTempFileName; emit webcil to subdir of obj #86972
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • Revert "Revert "Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images."" #86967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix rounding error in getLikelyClassesOrMethods #86965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StringMarshalling behavior override tests #86963
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int/uint casting behavior #86941
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat in a few more places #86931
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • [wasm] Use an older version of chrome for testing `113.0.5672.63` #86968
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clean-up error in `IDispatch::Invoke()` scenario #86964
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • System.Data: override System.Data.Sql tfm only when ArcadeBuildFromSource. #86962
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix ReversePInvoke typo #86958
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove some working tests from issues.targets #86939
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not have default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove comment in ZipFile.Create.cs #86927
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Cleanup BitMapper sizeof type #86881
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Remove implicitly dependent reference #86938
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Removed unnecessary string interpolation #86945
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the Prolog/Epilog for enabling OSR. #86866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Early out in impMarkInlineCandidate for minopts #86949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][bench] Limit initial samples #86953
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier intrinsic #86842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix recursive type support when consuming source generated code from the .NET 6 sdk. #86821
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • CI: specify BaseOS for the unknown rid build. #86688
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use underlying type converter for nullable type #84208
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use Knobs to populate AppContext switches #86883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Preserve type information of stack args when inlining #86898
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2191208 #86925
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do less work building Delegate.GetMethodInfo lookup #86930
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] A few cleanups in stack walking on Windows #86917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run sdk tests on wasm PRs #86744
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter type cast opcodes & add zero page optimizations #86928
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create DiagnosticInfo as an incremental Diagnostic replacement type. #86908
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction creation should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Use fully qualified type names for parameters and don't copy parameter attributes #86922
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Unify trim warnings for accessing compiler generated code #86816
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #86920
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Implemented IndexOf and LastIndexOf functions #86895
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
